messages.title: A VOTE FOR THE LIB DEMS IS A VOTE TO STOP BREXIT
messages.content: Vote Liberal Democrat to stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in schools and the National Health Service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping Brexit and investing the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services like schools and the NHS.

issues.brexitEurope: Lib Dems will stop Brexit and invest in public services.
issues.economy: Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services.
issues.education: Invest in schools with the £50 billion Remain Bonus.
issues.health: Invest in the National Health Service with the £50 billion Remain Bonus.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Resident, This election is a once in a generation opportunity to reshape our country's future. We must stop Brexit to ensure we can invest in our public services, tackle climate change and remain open, fair and inclusive. Yours sincerely, Graham Colley, Liberal Democrat Parliamentary Candidate for Rochester and Strood
